name: test_12_2_0_Create_Post_In_Community
description:
Test Case 225: Verify Admin Post Creation with Text and Image
Test Case 226: Verify Admin Post Draft Saving
Test Case 229: Verify Published Post Information

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Community page
4. Create a post with image and publish it
5. Verify the post is created and displayed
6. Create another post and save as draft
descriptionHtml:
Test Case 225: Verify Admin Post Creation with Text and Image
Test Case 226: Verify Admin Post Draft Saving
Test Case 229: Verify Published Post Information

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Community page
  4. Create a post with image and publish it
  5. Verify the post is created and displayed
  6. Create another post and save as draft
